channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The full TechCrunch Disrupt Stage revealed: Where the future of tech breaks first
item.description: The Disrupt Stage, only at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, is where tech’s biggest bets get made, live and unfiltered. It’s where startup dreams turn into $1...

item.title: Aura introduces a $499 e-ink digital photo frame that lets you go cordless
item.description: Aura, founded by early Twitter employees, has launched the $499 Ink frame, its first 13-inch color e-paper photo frame. Using Spectra 6 e-ink technolo...

item.title: 32 Best Gifts for Teens (2025), Tested by Us and Our Kids
item.description: Teenagers can be scary and impossible to shop for. From gaming chairs to cologne to slippers, these adolescent-approved gifts can help.

item.title: 17 Best Couches We’ve Tested That You Can Buy Online (2025)
item.description: Refresh your space with a sofa that arrives right at your doorstep. We’ve spent years in search of the best couches—read about all the styles we’ve te...

item.title: HBO Max just got more expensive
item.description: For new subscribers, the updated prices go into effect on Tuesday, while existing customers will see the change on their first billing cycle on or aft...

item.title: Only 6 days until TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 kicks off in San Francisco and ticket rates increase
item.description: Less than 6 days until TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 takes over San Francisco’s Moscone West! The countdown is on for the year's biggest gathering of founde...

item.title: Luminkey Magger68 Plus HE Review: Mechanical Heart
item.description: Luminkey’s Hall effect Magger68 Plus has the heart of a mechanical keyboard.

item.title: Oakley Meta Vanguard Review: The Do-It-All Smart Glasses
item.description: Meta's second collaboration with Oakley look good, sound great, and might just replace your action cam.

item.title: Veeam acquires data security company Securiti AI for $1.7bn
item.description: Veeam plans to offer Seucriti's data command center product alongside its existing data resiliency products.

item.title: Apple iPad Pro (M5, 2025) Review: Tremendously Powerful
item.description: Apple’s flagship tablet homes in on power, but it‘s the desktop-like iPadOS 26 experience that makes it shine.
